content: I hope you'll always be the happy protagonist of your own life! After all, happiness is the secret to a universe-wide box office hit! Gahaha~ga!

Happy birthday, my friend.

content: On your special day, I want you to know that every moment we've spent together has brought me so much joy! Hahaha~ha!

content:

When you're taking a bath,
if you peel and eat an orange—

content: And I hope to stay by your side as this popular movie plays out!
